body_content.explanation: happening together, at the same or right time, or in the expected way:
examples: The attacks don't appear to be synchronized.
Steamboat Willie was the first animated cartoon to use synchronized sound.
The female hormonal cycle is finely synchronized with the circulatory system and lymphatic drainage in particular.

body_content.explanation: (of clocks or watches) having been made to show the same time:
examples: NTP is used to keep all of the client and server clocks synchronized.
The second hands of numerous synchronised watches reached twelve.
